item.title: Clan Chat System
item.dc:creator: @_Llezrek _Llezrek
item.description:
@_Llezrek wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:5, topic:515050”]Yeah, it’s more like a snippet of a snippet. It really doesn’t even belong, probably since you ripped it out of a source, or just stole it from a tutorial.

If anything, you should give SOME explanation of where it should belong, what base it belongs to, etc., things that will help people implement in there server if they are in need of it.[/quote]

How much more explantion do I need?

item.title: Clan Chat System
item.dc:creator: @_Llezrek _Llezrek
item.description:
@_Llezrek wrote:

The7thSanctum:

This isn’t even a snippet. There’s only download links, so I don’t think it even counts as a snippet. Maybe if you put them in codetags, people would either use/consider this snippet.

The code is too long which is why it didn’t fit otherwise I would have done that.

And yes it is the full snippet. There’s a few other things that need to be added for it to be complete but it’s pretty self explanatory.

Read full topic
